price: ߝߏ߫ ߊ߬ ߡߏ߬ߛߏ ، ߊ߲ ߓߘߴߊ߬ ߟߊߕߍ߰ ߒ ߞߴߏ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߕߏߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߊ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَآ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: illā im'ra-atahu qaddarnā innahā lamina al-ghābirīna
